_source.title: 'Les Genoux', 2011
_source.description: Savoury fruit on the nose with fresh minerality and red fruit on the palate

_source.title: 'A' Amarone, 2011
_source.description: Ripe concentrated nose. Cherry chocolate palate with a balanced finish.

_source.title: 'Les Epices' Syrah, 2012
_source.description: Luscious, classy Syrah nose.  Black cherry, cinnamon and smoky bacon.  Medium-body.

_source.title: A Few Good Men Shiraz, 2012
_source.description: Ripe berry and plum aromas with a dry, attractive spicy berry palate.

_source.title: "Western Slopes" Reserve Shiraz, 2011
_source.description: Sweet, ripe berries and vanilla on the nose. Peppery, roasted flavours with a concentrated, great length and well balanced tannins.

_source.title: "Roccaviva" Rosso Piceno DOC Superiore, 2011
_source.description: Beautiful entering mocha nose with refreshing acidity and violet hints.

_source.title: 160th Anniversary Fortified Shiraz, 2008
_source.description: Still young with bright savoury red and black fruit on the nose and palate.  Not too sweet with chocolate and spice on the finish.

_source.title: 2Uvas, 2012
_source.description: Fragrant with dark berries. Concentrated palate with juicy fruit and ripe tannins.

_source.title: "Gran Pasisone" Rosso IGT Veneto, 2013
_source.description: Plums, cherries, rhubarb, burdock and milk chocolate. Very interesting and rich.
_source.manufacturer: Casa Vinicola Botter Carlo & C. Spa

_source.title: "Château Tamagne Reserve" sparkling wine,extra brut rose, 2012
"Il Grande" Montepulciano d'Abruzzo DOC, 2011
_source.description: Earthy, gutsy, dense and darkly fruity with unashamed backbone.
_source.manufacturer: Az. Agr. Toffali Maria Pia - Fosso Corno

_source.title: 'Aconcagua Costa' Chardonnay, 2013
_source.description: Juicy melon and tropical fruits with a fresh finish.

_source.title: 'The Blend Collection' Red, 2010
_source.description: Bright, youthful and perfumed, developing surprisingly slowly with purity of fruit on the palate. Wonderfully fresh, lifted finish.

_source.title: "Mas Cavalls" Pinot Noir, Doña Margarita Vineyard, 2010
"Novità" Sangiovese IGT, 2013
_source.description: Supple, bright, herby and plummy with cherries, spice and hints of earth.

_source.title: "M" Margaux de Malleret, 2011
_source.description: Cherry ripe spicy earthy dry ginger characters, Intense dark fruit. Vanilla oak finish.

_source.title: “La Masía” Chardonnay, Don Miguel Vineyard, 2010
_source.description: Rich style wine with generous ripe stone fruit. Light toasty notes and buttery flavours. The palate is rich and textured with a long finish. Buttery and ripe peach flavours.

_source.title: "Verso" Rosso IGT Salento, 2013
_source.description: juicy red currant and liquorice on nose. Red plums and morello cherries on palate.
_source.manufacturer: Casa Vinicola Botter Carlo & C. Spa

_source.title: "Reius" Amarone della Valpolicella Classico, 2008
_source.description: Complex, elegant leafy raspberry characters. Freshness and weight balanced by lovely acidity with a very long finish. Will continue to develop in complexity.

_source.title: 10 Year Old Aged Tawny, NV
_source.description: Spicy dried fruit. Herbal aromas, Round, warm, and long spicy finish.

_source.title: 12 Linajes Verdejo, 2013
_source.description: Good, solid and easy going, with hay and honeydew melon fruit.

_source.title: 12 Linajes Crianza, 2011
_source.description: Juicy, rounded, slightly oaky but with tangy cherry and berry flavours.  2 years+ to wait.

_source.title: 12 Linajes Reserva, 2009
_source.description: Lifted blueberry, sweet dried anise nose, complex palate - blackberries, raspberry jam, dark chocolate. Savoury with long finish

_source.title: 14 Secolo Chianti, 2012
_source.description: Light style, honest Sangiovese, pleasant summery finish.

_source.title: 1865 Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc, 2013
_source.description: Plenty of fruit, generous, honest and tangy with fennel and grassy notes.

_source.title: 20 Year Old Tawny, NV
_source.description: Bold and spirity; copper brown, lots of intense primary dried fruit flavours. Straight forward.
_source.grape: Touriga Nacional, Touriga Francesa, Tinta Roriz

_source.title: 7L Rosado de una noche, 2013
_source.description: Expressive strawberry and cherry fruits in a soft, charming and easy style.

_source.title: 'Wild Ferment' Chardonnay, 2013
_source.description: Sweet vanilla oak, butterscotch, juicy acidity and appealing citrus notes.  Full and rich.

_source.title: 'R' Valpolicella Superiore Ripasso, 2012
_source.description: Rich and concentrated with aromas of cherries. Savoury herbs and ripe plums with a lively juicy finish.

_source.title: 'Weissburgunder Sausal, 2013
_source.description: Fragrant meadow flowers, pretty, floral, balanced with lovely orchard fruit and nice minerality.

_source.title: > Cesanese, 2009
_source.description: Soft, gently with ripe plush berry and a hint of vanilla. structured but still friendly.

_source.title: "Ofithe" Offida DOCG Pecorino, 2012
_source.description: Prematurely aged? She is what she is. Attractive nuttiness. Spicy and wet earth. Medium bodied with dry and apricot fruits.

_source.title: "Vigna Novali" Castelli di Jesi Verdicchio DOCG Riserva Classico, 2011
_source.description: Green/gold with restrained herbal aromas. In the mouth much more effusive with yellow fruit, and a hint of spice.

_source.title: "Verde Ca' Ruptae" Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi DOC Classico Superiore, 2012
_source.description: Golden spicy and honeyed aroma give way to a wine with smooth honeycomb texture and a soft, elegant finish.

_source.title: 10 Year Old Sercial, NV
_source.description: Burnt orange and toffee aromas. A good deep and long lasting wine with age and quality.

_source.title: [Yellow Tail] Reserve Chardonnay, 2012
_source.description: Tropical fruit, Melon and pineapple flavours. Soft, light style.

_source.title: [Yellow Tail] Limited Release Cabernet Sauvignon, 2010
_source.description: Youthful cedar with vanilla, spice, liquorice, violets and black fruits. A creamy palate with depth, interest and length.

_source.title: 10 Year Old Verdelho, NV
_source.description: Fresh style with rich treacle, toffee and raisin character. Well balanced with a fruit cake finish.

_source.title: 15 Year Old Verdelho, NV
_source.description: Intense notes of caramel and toffee with a salty tang on the finish that lasts for ages. A wine to savour.

_source.title: 1er Cru Brut, NV
_source.description: Raspberries and lifted stone fruits. Very well integrated, elegant mousse, lovely balance.

_source.title: 3 Gen Carmenere, 2012
_source.description: Violet, intense dark chocolate, cedar, black fruit character with soft integrated tannins.

_source.title: 7 Vinas Reserva, 2007
_source.description: Complex mix of black fruit, savoury character and subtle oak. Fresh and balanced. Sweet, ripe, wild - strawberry fruit intensity.

_source.title: AA Dolç Mataró, 2011
_source.description: Lovely cherried flavour that is pure rich and intense. Sweet and well balanced with a good length that incorporates underlying structure and integrated acidity.

_source.title: 80 Vecchie Vigne, 2012
_source.description: Medium garnet, inviting spicy raised nose, stylish well balanced with rich plum fruit and a pepper character, long finish.

_source.title: "Divici" Prosecco DOC Bio, NV
_source.description: Complex nose, some nuttiness and ripe apple/pear. Good intensity, perfect acid and sugar balance.
_source.manufacturer: Casa Vinicola Botter Carlo & C. Spa

_source.title: "Dessert Vintage Traminer. Grand Dessert" Château Tamagne, 2010
Casa dei Faveri Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore DOCG Extra Dry, 2012
_source.description: Gentle fruit of ripe apple and pear with floral notes on the finish
_source.manufacturer: Cantine Vedova di Vedova Luigi & C. SNC

_source.title: `McKee Vineyardgitpu` Grüner Veltliner, 2013
_source.description: Clean floral aromatic and refreshing pear fruit.

_source.title: 20 Year Old Aged Tawny, NV
_source.description: Lovely concentration of cedar, coffee, raisins - lovely richness of textures with a lingering and complex finish

_source.title: "Nerone" Conero DOCG Riserva, 2009
_source.description: Crowd pleaser. Nice concentration, bold blueberry fruit, flavours of hot cocoa and vanilla beans. Solid finish.

_source.title: "Le Vele" Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi DOC Classico, 2013
"Marani" Bianco Veronese, 2012
_source.description: Rich stone fruits on the nose with a lovely floral lift. Rounded finish.

_source.title: "The Basin" Reserve Shiraz, 2011
_source.description: Refined, cool Shiraz style with bright fruit, savoury notes, supple tannins and great drinkability. Lovely freshness on the palate which lifts and lengthens the overall flavour.

_source.title: "Vigneti del Parco" Conero DOCG Riserva, 2010
_source.description: Dried figs with savoury spices and grilled meat character, ready to drink, leaves a lingering finish.

_source.title: 10 Year Old Tawny, NV
_source.description: Nutty, almonds, raisins, prunes and figs. Christmas pudding spices.
_source.grape: Touriga Francesa, Touriga Nacional, Tinta Roriz

_source.title: 10 Year Old Bual, NV
_source.description: Anise taste, Christmas cake, figs and plums with an attractive, ripe broad palate. Very good.

_source.title: 10 Year Old Malvasia, NV
_source.description: Notes of walnut, chocolate and Christmas pudding. A good overall balance with a fiery finish.

_source.title: [Yellow Tail] Limited Release Shiraz, 2010
_source.description: Amazing rich fruits on nose. Full body, brilliantly crafted. spicy, complex, menthol and eucalyptus hints next to warm fruits. Long, warm finish.

_source.title: 1868 Extra Dry DOCG, 2012
_source.description: An open floral and pretty aromatic wine. Enjoyable and soft with a crisp finish.

_source.title: 1865 Single Vineyard Syrah, 2011
_source.description: Plenty of fruit with lovely smoked oak which enhances the fruit flavours. Lovely structure juicy tannins underpinned by subtle spices.

_source.title: 1865 Single Vineyard Carmenere, 2011
_source.description: Spicy, generous dollop of black fruits, ripe, big and intense. Long.

_source.title: 40 Year Old Aged Tawny, NV
_source.description: Plenty of rich powerful fruit which has nutty and raisin notes and also plenty of good acidity. An opulent and long lasting wine.

_source.title: 30 Year Old Aged Tawny, NV
_source.description: An opulent and mature but beautifully complex wine with a great sugar and acid balance. Not overly heavy.

_source.title: AA Privat Laietà, 2010
_source.description: Fresh apple, citrus bouquet supported by moderate toasty qualities. Refined style. Not a blockbuster, but quite delicate, with mineral nuances. Lovely dry finish with citrus purity that lasts on the palate. Sophisticated wine worthy of a trophy and will continue to go for many years.

_source.title: A Fistful of Schist Chenin Blanc, 2013
Aaldering Sauvignon Blanc, 2013
_source.description: Classic pithy lemon and green apples. Good intensity, concentrated fruit.

_source.title: 'The Tithing' McLaren Vale Grenache, 2010
_source.description: Vibrant red berry fruit with violet hints.  Winning supple tannins.  A charming wine.

_source.title: Start page
_source.content: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32. Finibus Bonorum.
